entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries near noon. Becoming sunny this afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this afternoon. High 6. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow or rain. High 10.
